text: The Tracey Ullman Show was a weekly American television variety show, hosted by British comedian and former pop singer Tracey Ullman. It debuted on April 5, 1987 as the FOX network's second primetime series (after Married... with Children), and ran until May 26, 1990. The show featured sketch comedy along with many musical numbers, featuring Emmy Award-winning choreography by Paula Abdul. It also produced the hugely successful spin-off, The Simpsons. == Other websites == * * TV.com Entry * Watch Simpsons shorts * The Dr. N!Godatu web page * The Tracey Ullman Show Episode Guide Category:1987 American television series debuts Category:1980s American television series Category:American comedy television series Category:Fox television series Category:The Simpsons Category:English-language television programs
title: The Tracey Ullman Show
